l:dependency.name: Fortify Jenkins Plugin
l:dependency.l:description: Adds the ability to perform security analysis with Fortify Static Code Analyzer, upload results to Software Security Center, show analysis results summary, and set build failure criteria based on analysis results.

l:dependency.name: Fortify SSC REST API Client
l:dependency.l:description: Swagger generated client to communicate with Fortify Software Security Center web server via REST API to get vulnerability counts from the uploaded SCA results file

l:dependency.name: Pipeline: Step API
l:dependency.l:description: API for asynchronous build step primitive

l:dependency.name: Configuration as Code (JCasC)
l:dependency.l:description: The Configuration as Code plugin has been designed as an opinionated way to configure Jenkins based on human-readable declarative configuration files

l:dependency.name: OkHttp Client
l:dependency.l:description: An HTTP and HTTP/2 client for Android and Java applications

l:dependency.name: OkHttp Logging Interceptor
l:dependency.l:description: An OkHttp interceptor which logs HTTP request and response data

l:dependency.name: Gson
l:dependency.l:description: A Java serialization/deserialization library to convert Java Objects into JSON and back

l:dependency.name: Gson on Fire
l:dependency.l:description: A java library that adds some very useful features to Gson, like Date serializing to unix timestamp or RFC3339, method (getters) serialization, pre/post processors and many others.

l:dependency.name: ThreeTen-Backport
l:dependency.l:description: ThreeTen-Backport provides a backport of the Java SE 8 date-time classes to Java SE 6 and 7

l:dependency.name: Joda-Time
l:dependency.l:description: Joda-Time provides a quality replacement for the Java date and time classes
